title: Group Therapist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, create a "factional chat" with one of your therapy groups.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
At the beginning of the game, all players besides you will be randomly grouped into groups of three (or four, if there is a remainder of players). They cannot all be from the same faction, unless it is impossible to group people in this way. You will be told these groups.
If a person attacks someone in the same group as them, they will be roleblocked for the night. You will be told of this attempt in the day if the defender survives the night.
While you are living, if only players from a single group and you survive, that group all wins together.

desc:
Post 4304
*If you all look into yourselves, I think you will find that you can find peace between you.*
